name: Apple Dumplings
author: Anna Rose Bles
instructions: Make a syrup of sugar, water, cinnamon and nutmeg. Add but- ter. Pare, core and slice apples. Sift flour, salt, and baking powder. Cut in shortening. Add milk all at once, and stir until moistened. Roll 1/4 inch thick. Cut into 5 inch squares. Arrange apple slices on each square. Sprinkle generously with additional sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Dot with butter. Fold corners to center and pinch edges together. Place 1 inch apart in greased baking pan. Pour syrup over dumplings. Bake at 375Â° for 35 minutes.
